channel.title: You know youre addicted to runescape when
channel.description:
ok it goes like this..
you say
you know your addicted to runescape when...(example:i throw ice cubes at ppls cars and yell "ice barrage owns!!")
ok here we go..
ill start of..
you know when your addicted to runescape when.. you connect sausage links together and make a whip!:)

You know your addicted to Runescape when… you spent all your money on membership and starved to death

item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:167, topic:30551”]You know your addicted to Runescape when you wear a Runescape T-Shirt.

In school, I seen a guy wearing a shirt. On the front it has the Runescape logo and a picture of a dragon. On the back it says repeatings “Just one more level…”[/quote]
L O L @ THIS

anyway,

You know your addicted to RuneScape when you wear a gray shirt and draw mussels (i forgot how to spell it) and you say " OMG look i got a fighter torso!!!"

item.title: You know youre addicted to runescape when
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“Heaven, post:149, topic:30551”][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=44699.msg1767398#msg1767398 date=1190236513]
you know your addicted to RuneScape when you talk about being addicted to RuneScape on MoparScape
[/quote]
THIS IS MOPARISTHEBEST NOT MOPARSCAPE GTFO[/quote]
moparisthebest actully had private servers on it for a while till mopar decided to open a new forum for it because this forum was getting spammed and the bandwidth was getting used to much right?

[quote=“Bobby, post:148, topic:30551”][quote author=error.login link=topic=44699.msg1769838#msg1769838 date=1190340977]

you know your adcited when your having sex and then you say: yes, i gained a level w00t hax
[/quote][quote author=Bobby link=topic=44699.msg1766375#msg1766375 date=1190174852]
you know your adcited when your having sex and then you say: yes, i gained a level w00t hax

so thats what im addicted to eh

you know your addicted to runescape when you play it for a long time?
[/quote] why did u qout twice ?[/quote][quote=“Bobby, post:148, topic:30551”][quote author=error.login link=topic=44699.msg1769838#msg1769838 date=1190340977]

you know your adcited when your having sex and then you say: yes, i gained a level w00t hax
[/quote][quote author=Bobby link=topic=44699.msg1766375#msg1766375 date=1190174852]
you know your adcited when your having sex and then you say: yes, i gained a level w00t hax

so thats what im addicted to eh

you know your addicted to runescape when you play it for a long time?
[/quote] why did u qout twice ?[/quote]
srry about that my computer was reloading web pages twice so when i would quote somthing it would quote it twice and i got bored of correcting it so i left it
